::DarkMouse::  

She talked to her link,"Commander, she locked me up too.  I'm stuck 
in here while she went somewhere else.  I can't go anywhere.  And I 
have to admit, I'm getting a bit uneasy about being in here.  It's a 
might cramped."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Talon Harvilicz <talon_the_rider@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Quickstrike:
>  
> 
> Quickstrike wasn't near being comfortable caged up. When he suposed 
to be a soldier here, he was treated as a prisioner. That wasn't the 
way he wanted things to turn out. He wanted to be Black Arachnia's 
partner.
> 
> He heard Dark Mouse's voice in comm-link. "I'm okay," he replied to 
her. "Ya jus' do whatever she says an' behave yerself. Ask 'er when 
she's gonna get back t' me so ah can get outta this dang confinement. 
Ah hate bein' cooped up like this. Brings back memories." 
> 
> He looked around. It was almost like a while back when he berayed 
Megatron and got caught. They had him in a confinement until he was 
put up on trial. It gave him the creeps. He wanted to get out of this 
now. He was getting nervous.
> 
> 
>
